title: In a Dream
description: Emma has spent her life detached from relationships in an effort to keep those she cares about from getting hurt. When lifelong nightmares cause a strain between her and her best friend, Elise, Emma is forced to make a decision that will change her life forever. After Emma moves in with Aiden, a mysterious man who tests her desire to stay unattached, tragedy strikes again when her uncle is murdered. Emma searches for the killer while gradually growing more attached to Aiden. With her life in danger and her heart on the line, Emma will have to learn to let go of the past to finally realize what her future holds.This engaging new romantic thriller explores the need to heal from the past in order to find hope in the future. Using stirring drama to convey a message of hope and perseverance, this captivating book will grab readers with mystery while enthralling them with an intriguing love.
author: Ayla Wood
